price: 15. Mpe bakopesaka bango bitiyelo biye bisalami na mabende ya mbongo na bakopo bisalami na mabanga ya pembe ya kitoko bikotambwisama likolo na bango тропа kólia mpe komela,
arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭāfu ʿalayhim biāniyatin min fiḍḍatin wa-akwābin kānat qawārīrā
